title: Northrop Grumman dismisses speculation that its 2018 acquisition of Orbital ATK could be challenged
summary: Northrop Grumman does not expect an ongoing antitrust review of its acquisition of Orbital ATK to have any “adverse impact” on the company, said CEO Kathy Warden.

title: SOAR High School Student Wins NASA Armstrong Scholarship
summary: The NASA Armstrong Employee Exchange Council presented the 2022 John W. Russell Memorial Scholarship Award to Katelyn Perez.

title: Boeing takes another Starliner charge against its earnings
summary: Boeing said July 27 it will take another charge against its earnings because of the CST-100 Starliner commercial crew program as the company and NASA get closer to a first flight of the vehicle with astronauts on board.

title: Saltzman tapped to succeed Raymond as chief of the U.S. Space Force
summary: President Biden has nominated Lt. Gen. B. Chance Saltzman, U.S. Space Force deputy chief of operations, for promotion to four-star general and selected to become chief of space operations

title: Iridium enters development deal to bring its network to smartphones
summary: Satellite operator Iridium Communications said July 26 it has entered into a development agreement to enable its technology in smartphones.
